title: BONUS: Movie Mike's Movie Podcast: Actors Who Really Sang In Movies + Actors Who Tricked Us With Lip-Syncing + Movie Review: Molly’s Game
itunes:title: BONUS: Movie Mike's Movie Podcast: Actors Who Really Sang In Movies + Actors Who Tricked Us With Lip-Syncing + Movie Review: Molly’s Game
description:
In this episode, Movie Mike looks movies featuring actors playing a character who is singing on screen. He breaks down some famous actors whose real voices were actually featured in movies. And then breaks down actors who had someone else do the singing parts. Mike also reviews Molly’s Game which was highly recommended to him by Lunchbox of the Bobby Bones Show. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
